title: solo q anxiety?
body:
honestly idk why it happens but I was on my main decided to solo q again after a while because i need to get my shit together and get good and i die once and just have anxiety for the rest of the game. My sup constantly question pining and decided to leave lane for a bit and its was just a mess. Could have been an easy game if i had just not shit myself. Legit why does my anxiety have to affect me when I play. 

Please help me out what do i do? :(

replies.body:
Take a watch of this video man explains alot might actually help :)

https://youtu.be/NZi-grqY37c

do friend ranks only or flex to avoid troll teams???? Give tips, not poops, look for mia before chasing (missing allies too), always report in case of fake troll accounts feeding, and treat the team like kids you're babysitting (try adapt to them the best you can, e.g mass skillshots ad/ap caster because you can't trust them due to them purposely being toxic and waiting for you to die)
